00028 namespace Utilities.DataTypes

00034     public class List<T> : System.Collections.Generic.List<T>
00035     {
00036         #region Events
00037         public EventHandler<ChangedEventArgs> Changed;
00038         #endregion
00039 
00040         #region Public Functions
00041 
00042         public new void Add(T value)
00043         {
00044             try
00045             {
00046                 base.Add(value);
00047                 EventHelper.Raise<ChangedEventArgs>(Changed, this, new ChangedEventArgs());
00048             }
00049             catch { throw; }
00050         }
00051 
00052         public new void Remove(T obj)
00053         {
00054             try
00055             {
00056                 base.Remove(obj);
00057                 EventHelper.Raise<ChangedEventArgs>(Changed, this, new ChangedEventArgs());
00058             }
00059             catch { throw; }
00060         }
00061

00063         {
00064             try
00065             {
00066                 base.RemoveAt(index);
00067                 EventHelper.Raise<ChangedEventArgs>(Changed, this, new ChangedEventArgs());
00068             }
00069             catch { throw; }
00070         }
00071 
00072         public new void Insert(int index, T value)
00073         {
00074             try
00075             {
00076                 base.Insert(index, value);
00077                 EventHelper.Raise<ChangedEventArgs>(Changed, this, new ChangedEventArgs());
00078             }
00079             catch { throw; }
00080         }
00081

00083         {
00084             try
00085             {
00086                 base.Clear();
00087                 EventHelper.Raise<ChangedEventArgs>(Changed, this, new ChangedEventArgs());
00088             }
00089             catch { throw; }
00090         }
00091 
00092         #endregion
00093

00095

00097         {
00098             get { try { return base[index]; } catch { throw; } }
00099             set
00100             {
00101                 try
00102                 {
00103                     base[index] = value;
